title: Graphical Issue involving Oracle's Lens only (Not the Sweeping Lens)
body: Above is an image of what I'm talking about. Basically, if you activate Oracle's Lens and it comes in contact with any living thing, that living thing is mimicked in red until Oracle's Lens is moved off of it.

replies.body: It indeed is supposed to do this if the living thing is unseen by you and persists for a little after you gain vision. Doesn't look incorrect to me unless you had vision of that target before you even sweeped it. That SS doesn't necessarily prove a bug and I tried repro'ing your issue and didn't get it. If I see more reports or if you have more information OP then I'll gladly look into it again, thanks for the report mate.
